summary: A small-time con man seeks assistance from his mentor with the intention of settling scores with a gangster.
cast: Emraan Hashmi|Humaima Malik|Paresh Rawal|Kay Kay Menon|Deepak Tijori|Prachi Shah|Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub|Tarun Dudeja|Yugesh Anil|Vishwanath Chatterjee|Narendra Jetley|Shakti Kumar|Talib Mehdi|Rohit Pathak|Avinash Kumar Singh|Rajeev Yadav|Kunal Deshmukh
title: Raja Natwarlal
